### Upgrade Instructions

#### Automatic Update

Most users will receive this update automatically through the App Store or Google Play Store.

#### Manual Update

**iOS**:
1. Open App Store
2. Search for "Atom AI"
3. Tap "Update"

**Android**:
1. Open Google Play Store
2. Search for "Atom AI"
3. Tap "Update"

### Requirements

- **iOS**: iOS 13.0 or later
- **Android**: Android 8.0 (API level 26) or later

| Platform | File Size | Format |
